survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of co-working spaces to understand their satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and improve the overall experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a co-working space?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment users by frequency of use. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use a co-working space?

questions.question_text: Which amenities do you consider most important in a co-working space? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to prioritize key features. Limit to 3 selections to force prioritization.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question. Use checkboxes with a max selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: Which amenities do you consider most important in a co-working space? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale question to measure satisfaction. Ensure labels are clear on the extremes.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question. Use radio buttons with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the co-working space?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use a co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture diverse motivations. Keep the field size appropriate for short answers.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question. Use a text input field.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use a co-working space?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this co-working space to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple recommendation question. Helps gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this co-working space to others?
